lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Luke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
public void deleteTask(int taskNoDeleted) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
public void checkOffTask(int taskNoCompletedIndex) throws IllegalNumberInputException {
public void execute() throws IOException, IllegalNumberInputException {
public void setData(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage){
public abstract void execute() throws IOException, IllegalNumberStringException, IllegalNumberInputException;
public static final String GOODBYE_MESSAGE = "Bye! Hope to see you soon";
public static final String TASK_ADDED_MESSAGE = "Noted! I have added this task:";
public static final String TASK_COMPLETED_MESSAGE = "Nice! I have marked this task as done:";
public static final String TASK_DELETED_MESSAGE = "Noted! I have deleted this task:";
public static final String TASK_LIST_MESSAGE = "Okay! Here are your current tasks:";
public static final String FILE_ERROR_MESSAGE = "Oh no! There seems to be an error loading this file";
public static final String FUNCTIONS_USER_GUIDE_MESSAGE =  "done: marks a task from the list complete "
+ "delete: deletes a task from the list "
public static final String TASKS_USER_GUIDE_MESSAGE = "todo: Adds a new todo task "
public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE =  "Hello from\n" + LOGO
+ "Im your very own personal task manager!\n"
+ "\nOr you can amend your current tasks in your list!\n"
+ "list: lists all your current tasks in the list\n"
String errorMessage = "Invalid command! Here are the commands available:\n"
String errorMessage = "Number input is not in the list.\n" +
"Please input a number that is within the range of the list";
String errorMessage = "Please input a valid command number!\n" + FUNCTIONS_USER_GUIDE_MESSAGE;
String errorMessage = "Invalid event duration or deadline date input\n"
public void writeFile(TaskList list) throws IOException {
public static Task identifyTaskType(String userInput) throws IllegalTaskInputException, IllegalTimeException {
public static boolean isTask(String line) throws IllegalInputException {
public static Command parseInput(String userInput) throws IllegalInputException, IllegalTaskInputException, IllegalNumberStringException, IllegalTimeException {
public static Command prepareAddTask(String userInput) throws IllegalTaskInputException, IllegalTimeException {
public static Command prepareCheckOffTask(String userInput) throws IllegalNumberStringException {
public void showTaskAddedMessage(Task task, TaskList tasks){
System.out.println("Now you have " + tasks.getSize() + " tasks in your list.");
public void showTaskDeletedMessage(Task task, TaskList tasks){
System.out.println("Now you have " + (tasks.getSize()-1) + " tasks in your list");
System.out.println("Stop worrying! You have no tasks for now.");
